topic.title: Hospital Discharge Medications Section - conformance rules

section.p: The Hospital Discharge Medications Section contains information about the relevant medications of the medications ordered for the patient for use after discharge from the hospital.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Hospital Discharge Medications Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.22)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.8)
SHALL conform to IHE Hospital Discharge Medications Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.22)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10183-2" HOSPITAL DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.8)
